about_the_game:
Experience the thrill of high-speed chases in "Escape From The Police", an exhilarating endless-runner game that will test your skills and reflexes. You are a renegade driver with the law hot on your tail, driving at breakneck speed through bustling traffic and challenging obstacles. How long can you escape the pursuit?

Put the pedal to the metal and weave your way through incoming traffic and hazardous road conditions. Each game is unique, delivering an unpredictable, adrenaline-fueled adventure every time you play. But remember, one wrong move could end the chase!

In the pursuit, don't forget to collect coins. These valuable tokens can be used in the garage, where you have the chance to unlock new vehicles. Each car comes with its own unique attributes, adding another layer of strategy to the game. Choose the right vehicle and you could outrun the police for longer!

"Escape From The Police" offers:

Heart-pounding, high-speed chases
Intense and unique endless-runner gameplay
A variety of vehicles to purchase
Engaging challenges and obstacles
The thrill of dodging through oncoming traffic
A system of coin collection and progress rewards

Get ready to start your engine, hit the road, and Escape From Police! How far will you go to shake off the chase?

Note: Please play responsibly. Remember, reckless driving in real life is dangerous and illegal. This game does not endorse or promote unsafe driving behaviors.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any reasonable new Linux distro from CentOS 7.x and up
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3400G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.04, CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or Radeon RX 5700
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
